statements: SELECT * FROM training_plans WHERE date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT plan_id, distance FROM training_plans WHERE distance > 5;
SELECT plan_id, distance, pace FROM training_plans ORDER BY pace DESC;
SELECT plan_id, date FROM training_plans WHERE duration < '01:30:00';
SELECT * FROM training_plans ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM training_plans ORDER BY date DESC, distance ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT plan_id, pace FROM training_plans WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY date LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(distance) AS avg_distance, SUM(pace) AS total_pace FROM training_plans GROUP BY date
SELECT plan_id, duration FROM training_plans WHERE pace < 8.5 ORDER BY pace DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM training_plans WHERE date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY distance DESC, pace ASC
SELECT * FROM training_plans ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT plan_name, COUNT(*) as total_workouts FROM training_plans JOIN daily_workouts ON training_plans.plan_id = daily_workouts.plan_id GROUP BY training_plans.plan_name;
SELECT * FROM daily_workouts WHERE pace > 8.0 ORDER BY workout_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM daily_workouts WHERE duration > '1 hour' AND distance > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM training_plans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT plan_name, AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM training_plans JOIN daily_workouts ON training_plans.plan_id = daily_workouts.plan_id GROUP BY plan_name;
SELECT plan_name, SUM(duration) AS total_duration FROM training_plans JOIN daily_workouts ON training_plans.plan_id = daily_workouts.plan_id WHERE distance > 5 AND pace < 7 GROUP BY plan_name;
SELECT plan_name, duration FROM training_plans JOIN daily_workouts ON training_plans.plan_id = daily_workouts.plan_id ORDER BY duration DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM training_plans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, duration FROM training_plans WHERE distance > 5;
SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT distance, pace FROM workouts WHERE day = '2022-10-10';
SELECT * FROM training_plans WHERE duration < '02:00:00';
SELECT * FROM training_plans WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT date, pace FROM training_plans WHERE pace LIKE '%fast%';
SELECT u.name, w.day, w.distance, wp.date AS plan_date FROM users u JOIN workouts w ON u.user_id = w.plan_id JOIN training_plans wp ON wp.id = w.plan_id WHERE u.age >= 30 ORDER BY plan_date ASC;
SELECT u.name, w.distance, w.pace, w.duration FROM users u JOIN workouts w ON u.user_id = w.plan_id WHERE u.name = 'Alice' AND w.distance <= 5;
SELECT AVG(distance), MAX(duration), MIN(pace) FROM workouts GROUP BY plan_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
SELECT * FROM workout_duration;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans;
SELECT day, distance FROM daily_distance WHERE plan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT day, pace FROM daily_pace ORDER BY day DESC;
SELECT duration_id, day, duration FROM workout_duration WHERE pace_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM training_plans;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name FROM training_plans WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM daily_distance WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY day DESC;
SELECT day, distance FROM daily_distance JOIN training_plans ON daily_distance.plan_id = training_plans.plan_id WHERE plan_name = 'Marathon Training';
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_plans ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Training_Plans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM Training_Plans;
SELECT DISTINCT plan_id, plan_name FROM Training_Plans ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT day_date, distance_in_km FROM Training_Days JOIN Distance_Training ON Training_Days.day_id = Distance_Training.day_id WHERE distance_in_km > 5;
SELECT day_date, pace_per_km FROM Training_Days JOIN Pace_Training ON Training_Days.day_id = Pace_Training.day_id WHERE pace_per_km < '04:30:00';
SELECT * FROM Training_Plans WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM Training_Plans ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM Training_Plans WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.plan_name, d.day_date, dt.distance_in_km FROM Training_Plans t JOIN Training_Days d ON t.plan_id = d.plan_id JOIN Distance_Training dt ON d.day_id = dt.day_id WHERE dt.distance_in_km > 10;
SELECT wd.day_date, pd.pace_per_km, wd.duration_minutes FROM Workout_Duration wd JOIN Pace_Training pd ON wd.day_id = pd.day_id ORDER BY wd.duration_minutes DESC;
